snippet.title: Sweetcore Brews: Otome Dating Sim Game PV
snippet.description:
Nochi Studios' upcoming game title, "Sweetcore Brews" - a romantic comedy PC / mobile game about a tea-brewing witch, featuring minigames and a GxG / GXB romance! 

Kickstarter Campaign will be live from June 28th through July 28th! Check out the demo here: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/nochistudios/sweetcore-brews?ref=1mmzc7

More about the game: https://nochistudios.com/sweetcore-brews
Twitter: https://twitter.com/nochistudios
Instagram: https://instagram.com/nochistudios
Tumblr: http://nochistudios.tumblr.com
Facebook: http://facebook.com/nochigames
